name: The Age of Rifle & Musket: The Mexican-American War
name_original: The Age of Rifle & Musket: The Mexican-American War
description:
The Age of Rifle & Musket: The Mexican-American War is a strategy game developed by John Tiller. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by HPS Simulations.
You can play The Age of Rifle & Musket: The Mexican-American War on PC.
